TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 长嘴薹草 ( 原变种) chang zui tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Rhizome short, oblique. Female glumes aristate. Utricles sparsely hirsute. Style base curved.
treatment.distribution: Grassy slopes, mountain thickets, watersides, forests; 1200–2500 m. Hebei, Heilongjiang, Jilin, Liaoning, Shaanxi, Shanxi [Japan, Korea, Russia (Far East, Kamchatka)].
